summary_promot:
"You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or strategy guide.

"
        "Your task is to write a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image.
"
        "Do **not** speculate beyond what is explicitly visible in the image."
img_summary: The image is a screenshot from a video game showing a character holding a torch, navigating through a lush, forested area with webs and moss-covered rocks. The character is standing near two large clay pots. On the right side of the screen, there is an interface displaying "Will x57," indicating a resource or currency count. Various icons are visible on the screen, likely representing abilities or items available to the player. A glowing object is highlighted in the distance, suggesting a point of interest or collectible item.
